author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tile shower wall tips…I groove the tile then slowly tilt the diamond hole saw upward. This keeps the hole saw steady while drilling through porcelain. I like the chamfer cone for widening the hole and polishing. If you’re tiling a shower and need extra help, join our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tileshower #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Tile Shower Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #tileshower #diy
